Class AbstractWeapon

java.lang.Object
AbstractWeapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spawnable
public abstract class AbstractWeapon extends Object implements Spawnable
Contains all standard methods used by the weapon.

  • Constructor Summary

    AbstractWeapon​(int range, bagel.Image weapon, AbstractWeapon.WEAPON_TYPE type, PipeSet pipeSet)
    The AbstractWeapon constructor used as a super constructor for bombs and rocks to create a weapon object.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractWeapon

      public AbstractWeapon​(int range, bagel.Image weapon, AbstractWeapon.WEAPON_TYPE type, PipeSet pipeSet)
      The AbstractWeapon constructor used as a super constructor for bombs and rocks to create a weapon object.
      Parameters:
      range - The range of the weapon when shot
      weapon - An Image object containing the weapon in context
      type - The specific type of weapon required, available from WEAPON_TYPE enum
      pipeSet - The pipe set after which this particular weapon has been spawned

  • Method Details

    • setInitialPosition

      public bagel.util.Point setInitialPosition​(PipeSet pipeSet)
      Sets the initial position of the weapon at a random location between pipe sets
      Parameters:
      pipeSet - The pipe set after which the weapon is initialised
      Returns:
      The initialized random point for the weapon

      Checks whether the weapon has been picked up by bird
      Parameters:
      bird - The bird in play
      Returns:
      Returns true if the bird has picked up the weapon

      Returns:
